name: Sweet Dreams [LDJAM 37]
description:
Survive in the dreams of three siblings. Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37

How to Play

WASD to move

Up and Down Arrows to switch dreams

E to interact in game and on menu

R to attack

O fullscreen

Esc exit fullscren

Made By

TheTeaGuns (game design, art, animation)

LudumAnthony (game design, programming)

PolishedFruit (music and sound effects)


FIXED:

- Java errors

- Music bugs

- Spawning in the wrong place when leaving rooms
